original_title: King Crimson: In the Court of the Crimson King
overview: In the Court of the Crimson King: 50th Anniversary Edition (3 CDs + Blu-ray) present the 2019 mixes in stereo & instrumental forms. An expanded alternate album and the original album mix also with additional tracks. Blu-Ray: First time on Blu-Ray for this iconic album with all new mixes in stereo & 5.1, original album mixes and a multitude of extras all in HI-Resolution.
title: King Crimson: In the Court of the Crimson King
